algorithm_technique: Reverse the entire character array, then reverse each word in place using two pointers.
problem_summary_simple: Reverse the order of words in a character array in-place.
problem_summary_technical: In-place reversal of character array: global reverse, then word-by-word reversal using two pointers.
key_insights: The core idea is to reverse the entire string first, then reverse each word.
A helper function for in-place reversal is crucial.
Careful handling of word boundaries (spaces) is needed to identify words for reversal.
